title: Julia Belluz on Epidemiology, Nutrition, and Metabolism
description: Science writer Julia Belluz of Vox.com talks to EconTalk host Russ Roberts about the state of epidemiology, nutrition, and the relationship between obesity and metabolism.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (Library of Economics and Liberty)
